oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [PtCl(C6H4CH2O)(PhCH2O)PN(Ph)P(OCH2Ph)(2)], the first example of an ortho-metallated platinum(II) complex of a P-N-P ligand
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: chemistry
ortho-metallated platinum complex
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reaction of PhN{P(OCH2Ph)(2)}(2) with Pt(COD)Cl-2 at room temperature gives the ortho-metallated complex, 2 via intra C-H activation and the elimination of HCl, as well as the expected cis chelated complex 1.
